title: Rob Yates
deck: Hi my name is Rob, I live in the city centre, but have been a part of Gateway for many years. I'm on the leadership team of the music ministry and head up the AV side of things. I love being part of the Gateway family. I find purpose serving on team and worshipping as part of the band. My main passion is music and I think we have a great set up at church. Outside of church I enjoy sports, music, and Game of Thrones!
